text: Annexation (Latin: ad "to" and nexus "joining") is the one-sided forceful takeover, such as military occupation, of one state's territory by another.Hofmann, Rainer 2013. "Annexation". Annexation. Max Planck Encyclopedia of Public International Law. Oxford University Press. ==Related pages== *Anschluss (World War II, Austria merged to Nazi Germany) *Republic of Texas annexed to United States *Colonization == References == Category:Politics Category:International law Category:Political geography
title: Annexation
